com.faltro.houdoku.plugins.tracker

Class GenericTrackerOAuth

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.faltro.houdoku.plugins.tracker.GenericTrackerOAuth
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Tracker, TrackerOAuth
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AniList

    public class GenericTrackerOAuth
extends java.lang.Object
implements TrackerOAuth
    This class contains implementations for some methods from TrackerOAuth that are expected to be common between most OAuth-based tracker plugins.

    For method and field documentation, please see the TrackerOAuth class.

    See Also:
    TrackerOAuth

      • generateToken

        public void generateToken(java.lang.String code)
                   throws NotImplementedException,
                          java.io.IOException
        Description copied from interface: TrackerOAuth
        Generate the user's access token.

        If this method successfully retrieves a valid token, Tracker.isAuthenticated() will be true.

        Specified by:
        generateToken in interface TrackerOAuth
        Parameters:
        code - a verification code given by the user after authorization
        Throws:
        NotImplementedException - the operation has not yet been implemented for this tracker
        java.io.IOException - an IOException occurred when generating

      • verifyAuthenticated

        public void verifyAuthenticated()
                         throws NotImplementedException,
                                java.io.IOException
        Description copied from interface: Tracker
        Verify whether the client is actually authenticated with the server, regardless of a cached `authenticated` property.

        The Tracker.isAuthenticated() property is updated, if necessary.

        This function is particularly useful to check whether any access token is still valid after the client was restarted.

        Specified by:
        verifyAuthenticated in interface Tracker
        Throws:
        NotImplementedException - the operation has not yet been implemented for this tracker
        java.io.IOException - an IOException occurred when checking

      • getToken

        public java.lang.String getToken()
        Description copied from interface: TrackerOAuth
        Get the user's access token.

        Returns null if the user is not authenticated.

        Specified by:
        getToken in interface TrackerOAuth
        Returns:
        the user's access token, or null

      • updateChaptersRead

        public void updateChaptersRead(java.lang.String id,
                               int num)
                        throws NotImplementedException,
                               NotAuthenticatedException,
                               java.io.IOException
        Description copied from interface: Tracker
        Safely update the number of chapters read for a series.

        If the user's number read is greater than the given value, the number on the tracker is not changed.

        Specified by:
        updateChaptersRead in interface Tracker
        Parameters:
        id - the series id
        num - the number of chapters read
        Throws:
        NotImplementedException - the operation has not yet been implemented for this tracker
        NotAuthenticatedException - the user is not authenticated
        java.io.IOException - an IOException occurred when updating
